column14: effect

column14: Goes through soft materials
Capable of greatly moving things

column16: Has the ability to blow up chunks of soft Materials
Has the ability to blow up chunks of soft Materials. Has its gravity inverted.

Deals damage by physically hitting enemies, grabs things

column14: Leaves behind a trail of dark flames

column16: Player starts the game with a wand containing this spell

column14: Explodes in a cross pattern
Explodes in a cross pattern
column16: Although it is classified as an explosion it has a projectile component that will go through Explosion Immunity.

column14: Electrifies liquids such as water, blood, etc. Causes the wand to emit sparks of electricity. Speed Up can actually increase the range.
column16: Electrifies liquids such as water, blood, etc. Causes the wand to emit sparks of electricity. Speed Up can actually increase the range.

column14: Turns everything in a short radius into gold, including walls, creatures... and you.

Turns everything in a short radius into spirits, including walls, creatures... and you.

Conjures a freezing aura at casting location. Freezes enemies and liquids that come into contact with in.

A growing orb of negative energy that destroy everything in its reach. Unlike Black Hole, this can damage the player
Uncovers a large area of the map around the player. Does not light up the Dark Cave between the Collapsed Mines and Twisty Cave.
Lights the end of a wand on fire and illuminates the area around the player. The fire is harmless to the player but can ignite flammable Materials
A bright but very dangerous light!
Creates a halfcircle shield in front of the player. The shield will dissipate after deflecting a number of projectiles.
Creates a circle around the player. The shield will dissipate after deflecting a number of projectiles.
Reduces the time between spellcasts

Causes the projectile to fly chaotically wherever it wishes

After a short time, the projectile aims straight upwards

Causes the projectile to fly towards you
Surrounds the projectile with a damaging energy field

Adds 100% critical hit chance to projectiles on bloody enemies
